entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
